CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 29, 1974, p. 24, reads: "Tim and The Three B's - Tim Stevens, executive director of the N.A.A.C.P., incorporates the forces of Bev. Smith, Bea Hall and Brenda Simons for the benefit of the current membership campaign.Bev Smith began her broadcasting career in 1971 at WPXI, followed by positions at KDKA-TV and WAMO. Since 1998, she has been hosting "The Bev Smith Show."
TitMainTitle: Bev Smith, Bea Hall, Tim Stevens, and Brenda J. Simons holding bumper stickers reading "N.A.A.C.P. Means Concerned People, 100,000 more in 74," for NAACP membership campaign drive
CatSubject_tab: National Association for the Advancement of Colored People.Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Stevens, Tim.Simons, Brenda.Smith, Bev.Hall, Bea.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Campaign posters--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
